game.name: Proxima B
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A short Sci-fi adventure game made for the Game Boy Color in GB Studio! Solve puzzles, collect energy for your weapons, and fight the alien Ackloids to claim the planet Proxima B for the humans!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short Sci-fi adventure game made for the Game Boy Color in GB Studio! Solve puzzles, collect energy for your weapons, and fight the alien Ackloids to claim the planet Proxima B for the humans!
